about_the_game:
Imagine a giant house, that has billions of apartments, whose corridors are dangerous and contain many secrets. The entire house is controlled by the almighty Party - the last stronghold of order in this insane world. It is here that you will take on the leadership role of one of the settlements.

SIMPLE GAMEPLAY

Swipe left and right - decide the fate of people, but make sure that fate doesn't decide you! Each decision affects four parameters: preparedness for SAMOSBOR, population, combat capability, resources. When one of the points reaches the minimum or maximum value, the game ends with the death of the protagonist. But don't worry, the Party will appoint a new Head and you will return to rule your Bloc again.
Keep your balance to advance through the story. Receiving positive Block's effects. battle with the creatures of SAMOSBOR. Find the Liquidator's Notes.

EXCITING PLOT

Patria, Church of Chernobog, scientists, sectarians, liquidators and ordinary workers! Which of them will you support, and who will become your enemy? It's up to you to decide!

LIFE IN GIGAHRUSHEVKA - DEATH IN SAMOSBOR

After the siren, do not forget to close the pressurized door in your roomcell, otherwise the liquidators will scrape you off the walls ..

Survive! Lead your Block through the horrors of SAMOSBOR, hunger and turmoil! Reveal all the secrets of Gigakhrushchevka!

About the world of REIGNS of SAMOSBOR

Gigakhrushchevka - gigantic house made in the style of the houses of the USSR in the mid-20th century. There is no exit. There are no windows. The exact dimensions are unknown.
Block - settlement inside Gigakhrushchevka. It is controlled by the Head, that is, by You.
SAMOSBOR - mysterious phenomenon, deadly for people, periodically occurring in Gigakhrushchevka. The only way to escape is to close yourself in your roomcell with a pressurized door.
Party - main and only authority in Gigakhrushchevka.
Liquidators - executive agencies that monitors order, eliminates external and internal threats, and most importantly eliminates the consequences of SAMOSBOR

Features of REIGNS of SAMOSBOR


  • More than 500 random and quest events
  • About 50 arts in a unique hand-drawn style
  • 6 endings
  • A unique universe invented by hundreds of people in the Internet
  • Swipe and decide the fate of people
  • Complete missions - learn about the universe of SAMOSBOR
  • Show your speed reaction and logical thinking in the battle with the creatures of SAMOSBOR

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, scenes of drinking alcohol and fantasy drugs, fantasy drugs and alcohol abuse, self-harm, suicide

name: Reigns of Samosbor: П747
short_description: Try on the role of Head of the Bloc, one of the many settlements inside Gigakhrushchevka. Lead your Bloc through the horrors of SAMOSBOR, conspiracies and lack of resources. Make the right decisions and try to survive!
